de.cau.cs.kieler.sim.kiem.execution
Class JSONMerger

java.lang.Object
  de.cau.cs.kieler.sim.kiem.execution.JSONMerger

public class JSONMerger
extends java.lang.Object

The Class JSONMerger implements the merging functionality of used by the DataPool. It is able to merge two JSONObjects (that are lists of key-value-pairs) into one object.

Author:
Christian Motika - cmot AT informatik.uni-kiel.de, Stephan Knaur

Constructor Summary
JSONMerger()
          Instantiates a new jSON merger.
 
Method Summary
 de.cau.cs.kieler.sim.kiem.json.JSONObject mergeObjects(de.cau.cs.kieler.sim.kiem.json.JSONObject base, de.cau.cs.kieler.sim.kiem.json.JSONObject merge)
          Merges two JSON objects together (recursively), with values from "merge" replacing values in "base" to produce a new object.

Method Detail

mergeObjects

public de.cau.cs.kieler.sim.kiem.json.JSONObject mergeObjects(de.cau.cs.kieler.sim.kiem.json.JSONObject base,
                                                              de.cau.cs.kieler.sim.kiem.json.JSONObject merge)
                                                       throws de.cau.cs.kieler.sim.kiem.json.JSONException
Merges two JSON objects together (recursively), with values from "merge" replacing values in "base" to produce a new object.

Parameters:
base - The base object that values will be replaced into.
merge - The object to merge values from.
Returns:
the JSON object
Throws:
de.cau.cs.kieler.sim.kiem.json.JSONException - if the two objects can't be merged for some reason.
